behavior load_shirt_in_washing_machine(shirt:item, washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, washing_machine)
        # Place the shirt inside the washing machine

behavior start_washing_machine(washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve closed(washing_machine)
        # Close the washing machine door
        achieve is_on(washing_machine)
        # Turn on the washing machine

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and id[shirt]==2086
        # Select shirt with ID 2086
        bind washing_machine: item where:
            is_washing_machine(washing_machine)
        # Select a washing machine
        load_shirt_in_washing_machine(shirt, washing_machine)
        start_washing_machine(washing_machine)

behavior find_and_prepare_shirt_to_iron(shirt:item, basket:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, basket)
        assert is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        
def has_ironing_board():
    # Check if an ironing board is available
    symbol has_board=exists board: item : is_ironing_board(board)
    return has_board

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind basket_for_clothes: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket_for_clothes) and id[basket_for_clothes]==2006

        bind clothes_shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(clothes_shirt) and inside(clothes_shirt, basket_for_clothes)
        
        find_and_prepare_shirt_to_iron(clothes_shirt, basket_for_clothes)
        
        if has_ironing_board():
            bind ironing_board: item where:
                is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
            achieve on(clothes_shirt, ironing_board)
        # Ironing board located and shirt placed for ironing

behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item, iron:item, ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(shirt)
        achieve close_char(char, ironing_board)
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board)
        achieve is_on(iron)
        # Place the shirt on the ironing board and turn on the iron Iron the shirt

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and close_char(char, shirt)
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        iron_shirt(shirt, iron, ironing_board)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['Iron the shirt.']

def locate_basket_for_clothes(basket:item):
    symbol basket_found=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(basket, room)
    return basket_found

behavior retrieve_shirt_from_basket(clothes_shirt:item, basket:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(clothes_shirt, basket)
        achieve_once inhand(clothes_shirt)

behavior plug_iron_in(iron:item, powersocket:item):
    body:
        achieve plugged(iron)
        achieve is_on(iron)

behavior iron_the_shirt(clothes_shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(clothes_shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind basket: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and locate_basket_for_clothes(basket)
        # Getting the basket with clothes in the bathroom

        bind clothes_shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(clothes_shirt) and inside(clothes_shirt, basket)
        # Select shirt from the basket
        
        retrieve_shirt_from_basket(clothes_shirt, basket)
        
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron

        bind powersocket: item where:
            is_powersocket(powersocket) and close(powersocket, iron)
        # Select a power socket close to the iron

        plug_iron_in(iron, powersocket)
        iron_the_shirt(clothes_shirt)

['Iron the shirt.']

            is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and id[basket]==2006

        bind clothes_shirt: item where:

        # Select the shirt inside the basket

        # Select an ironing board

        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron

        achieve_once inhand(clothes_shirt)
        # Achieve holding the shirt momentarily for ironing

        # Plug in the iron

        # Turn on the iron

        # Approach the ironing board

behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item, ironing_board:item, iron:item):
    body:

        achieve plugged(iron) 
        achieve is_on(iron) 

behavior __goal__():

        bind basket_for_clothes_2006: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket_for_clothes_2006)

        bind shirt: item where:
